item.description:
You are invited to the NorthShore MA pug meetup
When: The 2nd Saturday of every month (Rain or Shine)
Time: 9:00am-11:00am
Where:
950 Cummings Center
108Y
Beverly, MA 01915
1-978-921-1300

The owner of Boston K9, Denise O'Brien, has agreed to host our pug meets in her facility. The space has an indoor play area and an attached outdoor play area and both are fully enclosed. All pugs can be off leash and safe.
Cost is $5 per Pug, $3 additional family Pug. All small breed dogs are welcome.
Please no aggressive/dominant dogs.

meetup organizer: Jodi Webster
jwebster@mitre.org


Thanks everyone!

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: March Monthly Pug Meetup
